identity.name: Biz Dev Phil
identity.subtitle: Online Brand & Marketing Strategist
identity.value: Strategy-first partner for founders ready to scale: I build conversion-driven websites, run full-funnel marketing, and lead content production so launches stay on schedule, teams stay aligned, and every moment moves people from curious to committed advocates for your brand across all channels daily.

testimonials.quote: Honestly, we’re lucky to have crossed paths with someone capable of moving so naturally between creative narrative, market psychology, and emotional precision. You understand how to feel the crowd.
testimonials.author: Pablo Garcia

testimonials.quote: At only 20 years old, you already have the skills to create apps, automations, and ads. That’s truly impressive.
testimonials.author: Michael Reyes

researches.title: Content Research Sprint Plan
researches.goal: Identify winning formats, hooks, and gaps across 50+ competitors to steer your next calendar.
researches.method: Audit competitor activity, map engagement trends, surface white space, and translate the findings into a monthly roadmap.
researches.result: A prioritized action plan with formats to double down on, gaps to own, and metrics benchmarks to track.

researches.title: Content Viral Hook Research
researches.goal: Identify the most effective hooks for the niche to drive view time and inquiries.
researches.method: Research 50 hooks; select the top 3 by performance; write scripts; post for 1 month.
researches.result: TBD — track views, watch time, CTR, and inquiries weekly.

seo.title: Biz Dev Phil — Online Brand Strategist
seo.description: Helping businesses develop their brand online with websites, apps & tools, content systems, research, and automations.
